meanings.definition: A person who records sounds or music.
meanings.sent1: The recordist captured the beautiful melody on tape.
meanings.sent2: The recordist saved the band's performance for future listening.
meanings.sent3: The recordist accidentally recorded the chirping birds instead of the music.
meanings.sent4: The recordist's ears were like microphones, picking up every note in the room.
meanings.sent5: The recordist's job was to preserve the music in digital form.

meanings.definition: The act of recording sounds or music.
meanings.sent1: The recordist's equipment was set up to capture the live concert.
meanings.sent2: The recordist's job involved pressing the 'record' button at the right moment.
meanings.sent3: The recordist's recording of the thunderstorm was so clear, it sounded like a movie.
meanings.sent4: The recordist's work was like freezing moments in time with sound.
meanings.sent5: The recordist's skill in capturing sound was unmatched in the industry.
